newFeatures.title: Introduced Chat History for Mia-Assistant
description: Users can now access past conversations with the Mia-Assistant through a chat history view, which displays a list of previous chats with automatically generated titles and allows them to be reopened directly from the chat interface.

improvements.title: UX/UI Improvements of Projects List
description: The Projects list now includes the project creation date, supports sorting by name and creation date, and firstly displays the Favorites tab by default.

bugFixes: We resolved an issue where clicking on the Mia-Platform Console logo caused an infinite loading state instead of redirecting the user to the list of their companies.
